Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.26998557] Gram-positive bacteria :Staphylococcus aureus 6271(MIC>100 μM), Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=10 μM);Gram-negative bacteria :Escherichia coli(MIC=26 μM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa 5482(MIC=6.4 μM);Fungi :Candida albicans(MIC=12 μM)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.26998557] LC50>400 μM against human red blood cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against Gram-positive bacteria and Gram-negative bacteria. Antifungal activity against Candida albicans
